definition: to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: Most school counselors have offices where you can sit down and talk.
sentences.chinese: 大多數學校的輔導員都有辦公室，你能坐下來談談。

sentences.english: Many times we have life coaches of our own.
sentences.chinese: 很多時候我們都有自己的生活輔導員。

sentences.english: I suggest that you should talk to a professional counselor at your university.
sentences.chinese: 我建議妳跟大學裏的職業輔導員相談一下。

sentences.english: Counselors meet with students individually or in small groups.
sentences.chinese: 輔導員與學生單個見面，或小組見面。

sentences.english: In 1989, she got her first job as a computer tutor.
sentences.chinese: 1989年，她得到的第一份工作是擔任電腦輔導員。

sentences.english: So if you see your counselor, it's not the same as getting therapy.
sentences.chinese: 因此如果你見到你的輔導員，它與接受治療是不同的。

sentences.english: Secondly, the analysis of existing performance assessment methods instructor problems.
sentences.chinese: 其次，分析了現行輔導員績效考覈辦法存在的問題。

sentences.english: It takes a lot of training to be a school counselor.
sentences.chinese: 成爲一名學校輔導員需要大量的培訓。

sentences.english: You stare at me in junior counselor bully people?
sentences.chinese: 你還瞪着我，大三輔導員欺負人嗎？

sentences.english: But, usually I'm a camp counsellor, so, you know.
sentences.chinese: 不過，我一般都是作爲夏令營的輔導員參與項目的。

sentences.english: Talk to your school counsellor if you are still at school.
sentences.chinese: 如果你還在上學，你也可以和學校輔導員談一談。

sentences.english: The counselor isn't going to go blabbing your business around school.
sentences.chinese: 在學校裏，輔導員不會去八卦你的事。

sentences.english: Jacob had been older than the other children, some kind of counsellor.
sentences.chinese: 雅各布比其他孩子都年長，像輔導員之類的。

sentences.english: The counselor on our trip forgot our toilet paper, bread and tent.
sentences.chinese: 我們的輔導員忘了帶我們的衛生紙，麪包和帳篷。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, I should thank the foreign teachers, assistants and the teachers in HIU college.
sentences.chinese: 同時，感謝外籍教師，輔導員和學院的教師。

sentences.english: Some deans and guidance counselors complain that it’s too easy.
sentences.chinese: 有些院長和輔導員抱怨它太容易了。

definition: to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
to expel (a member of an organization)/to fire (an employee)
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to give guidance/to mentor/to counsel/to coach/to tutor
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
